artist: Artist: David Shrigley; Printer: Schaefer Grafiske Værksted, Copenhagen; Publisher: Galleri Nicolai Wallner, Copenhagen
description: Line drawing of a broad shouldered man on a pyramid of steps, with a blackened, scratched out face and a medal hanging from his neck.
image_copyright: © David Shrigley %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York %2F DACS%2C UK
provenance: (Galleri Nicolai Wallner, Copenhagen); William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis
signed: Signed with initials and dated in pencil, LR: DS 05
title: Untitled (Man with medal and erased face)
